class.name: commander.tasks.knowledges.FireSupport
class.description: The knowledge of the 'FireSupport' mission. This knowledge is used by the commander agent to perform this mission.

method.name: getEntitiesToSupport
method.description: Returns the subordinate units to be supported by the rear echelon units.

method.name: getNbrFront
method.description: Returns the number of first line units. The returned value is the one defined by the user when he issues the mission. If no value is defined, it returns a value of '2'.

method.name: getSupportingPosition
method.description: Returns the current supporting position that must be issued to forward echelon units.

method.name: getDirection
method.description: Returns the main objective to face.
